page.title: 03INTERVIEW WITH MR. HOOKER
page.content: We went to see{Mr.Hooker.}He is an elderly resident.He is eighty nine and has worked in the nursery for sixty to seventy years.He has two sons and one daughter,they all work in the nursery. Mr. Hooker was born in Winchester and married in Sparsholt.He has just celebrated his{Diamond}wedding anniversery. Mr.Hooker would never leave Littleton.He likes reading and there is a mobile library.He does not drink or smoke(may be that is why he has lived so long).He gets his food from Littleton post office but he gets furniture ect. from Winchester. There are now street lamps and there never have been. Until the last two years there have been no policemen. Mr.Hooker does not mind Littleton all though he can remember when {Flowerdown}was open downs and grass.
